title: Buildroid AI expands simulation-first robotics platform to U.S. sites
description:
Buildroid says its block-laying robot and supporting mobile robots, validated in simulation, can automate 80% of masonry work.

The post Buildroid AI expands simulation-first robotics platform to U.S. sites appeared first on The Robot Report.
